title: Bundle of Horseshoe Balloons
summaries: The Bundle of Horseshoe Balloons is an accessory which combines the functionalities of the Bundle of Balloons and the Lucky Horseshoe.

When equipped, it allows the wearer to perform a quadruple jump, as well as increasing the player's jump height by 33%, jump speed by 30%, and increases the player's <linked>luck</linked> by 0.05. Each of the jumps has an effect from the different combined items: <linked>sandstorm jump</linked>, then <linked>blizzard jump</linked>, then <linked>cloud jump</linked>. Having it equipped also prevents the player from taking <linked>fall damage</linked>.

statistics.Tooltip:
Allows the holder to quadruple jump
Increases jump height and negates fall damage
statistics.Sell: 4
